mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(A.MNO), -4), 0) + 1, 4, '0') MNO FROM MEMBER A
SELECT LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(A.BNO), -4), 0)+1, 4, '0') BNO FROM BOARD A where BTYPE = 'Q'
SELECT LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(A.BNO), -4), 0)+1, 4, '0') BNO FROM BOARD A WHERE BTYPE = 'N'
SELECT NVL(MAX(INSTR(A.RNO, -4)), 0) + 1 RNO FROM REPLY A
SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(RB.RBNO, -4)), 0) + 1 RBNO FROM RECIPE_BOARD RB
SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(LP.LPNO, -4)), 0) + 1 LPNO FROM LIKEPRODUCT LP
SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.INO, -4)), 0) + 1 INO FROM CHEF_INFO A
SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.FNO, -4)), 0) + 1 FNO FROM FAVORITES A
